property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: FeatureHouse composes several languages, e.g., Java, XML and Python.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Export-Package: de.ovgu.featureide.ahead Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.core.resources,de.ovgu.featureide.core,de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core Bundle-Activator: de.ovgu.featureide.ahead.AheadCorePlugin Bundle-Name: Ahead Core Plug-in Bundle-Version: 2.3.5.200911041622 Bundle-Vendor: University of Magdeburg Bundle-SymbolicName: de.ovgu.featureide.core.ahead;singleton:=true Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Bundle-ClassPath: lib/jak2java.jar,lib/tools.jar,.,lib/mixin.jar Manifest-Version: 1.0

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.jface.text,org.eclipse.ui.editors,org.eclipse.ui.workbench.texteditor,org.eclipse.ui.ide,org.eclipse.jdt.ui,org.eclipse.debug.ui,org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui,org.eclipse.ui.views,org.eclipse.gef,FeatureIDE_FM_Core Bundle-Activator: featureide.fm.ui.FMUIPlugin Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Version: 2.2.4.200905090209 Export-Package: featureide.fm.ui.editors; uses:="org.eclipse.jface.action, featureide.fm.ui.editors.grammar, org.eclipse.ui.texteditor, org.eclipse.core.runtime, featureide.fm.core, org.eclipse.ui, org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry, org.eclipse.jface.viewers, org.eclipse.ui.part, org.eclipse.swt.widgets",featureide.fm.ui.editors.configuration;uses:="org.eclipse.swt.graphics,org.eclipse.jface.viewers" Bundle-SymbolicName: FeatureIDE_FM_UI;singleton:=true Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Bundle-Name: FeatureIDE - Feature Model UI Plug-in

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: FeatureHouse composes several languages, e.g., Java, XML and Python.

uninstallFeature(feature:${artifact},featureId:default,featureVersion:default)

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.core.resources,de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core,de.ovgu.featureide.core Bundle-Activator: de.ovgu.featureide.featurecpp.FeatureCppCorePlugin Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Version: 2.3.1.200905221124 Bundle-SymbolicName: de.ovgu.featureide.core.featurecpp;singleton:=true Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Bundle-Name: FeatureC++ Core Plug-in Bundle-Vendor: University of Magdeburg

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: FeatureHouse composes several languages, e.g., Java, XML and Python.

instructions.instruction: Bundle-Vendor: University of Magdeburg Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Activator: de.ovgu.featureide.ahead.AheadCorePlugin Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Bundle-ClassPath: lib/jak2java.jar,lib/tools.jar,.,lib/mixin.jar Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.core.resources,de.ovgu.featureide.core,de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core Bundle-Name: Ahead Core Plug-in Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-SymbolicName: de.ovgu.featureide.core.ahead;singleton:=true Bundle-Version: 2.3.1.200905221226

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; type `show c' for details. If this is what you want to do, use the GNU Lesser General Public License instead of this License.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

instructions.instruction: Bundle-Vendor: University of Magdeburg Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Activator: de.ovgu.featureide.featurehouse.FeatureHouseCorePlugin Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Bundle-ClassPath: lib/FeatureHouse-0.2.jar,. Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.core.resources,de.ovgu.featureide.core,de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core Bundle-Name: FeatureHouse Plug-in Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-SymbolicName: de.ovgu.featureide.core.featurehouse;singleton:=true Bundle-Version: 2.3.5.200911041622

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: FeatureHouse composes several languages, e.g., Java, XML and Python.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Version: 2.3.1.200905221124 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.ui.cheatsheets,org.eclipse.ui.intro Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-SymbolicName: de.ovgu.featureide.ui.doc;singleton:=true Bundle-Name: FeatureIDE Documentation Plug-in Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Bundle-Vendor: University of Magdeburg

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Activator: featureide_ui.FeatureModelUIActivator Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.jface.text,org.eclipse.ui.editors,org.eclipse.ui.workbench.texteditor,org.eclipse.ui.ide,org.eclipse.jdt.ui,org.eclipse.debug.ui,org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui,org.eclipse.ui.views,org.eclipse.gef,FeatureIDE_FM_Core Bundle-Name: FeatureIDE - Feature Model UI Plug-in Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-SymbolicName: FeatureIDE_FM_UI;singleton:=true Bundle-Version: 2.1.0 Created-By: 10.0-b23 (Sun Microsystems Inc.) Eclipse-LazyStart: true Export-Package: featureide_ui.editors; uses:="org.eclipse.jface.action, featureide_ui.editors.grammar, org.eclipse.ui.texteditor, org.eclipse.core.runtime, featureide_core.model, org.eclipse.ui, org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry, org.eclipse.jface.viewers, org.eclipse.ui.part, org.eclipse.swt.widgets",featureide_ui.editors.configuration;uses:="org.eclipse.swt.graphics,org.eclipse.jface.viewers" Ant-Version: Apache Ant 1.7.0

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

Feature Model Core Plug-in Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-SymbolicName: FeatureIDE_FM_Core;singleton:=true Bundle-Version: 2.2.4.200905090213 Export-Package: Jakarta.DRAttributes,Jakarta.SwingUtils;uses:="javax.swing",Jakarta.collection,Jakarta.io;uses:="Jakarta.collection,Jakarta.string",Jakarta.loader,Jakarta.string,Jakarta.symtab,Jakarta.util;uses:="Jakarta.loader",featureide.fm.core;uses:="org.prop4j,org.eclipse.core.resources",featureide.fm.core.configuration;uses:="featureide.fm.core.model,org.eclipse.core.resources",featureide.fm.core.editing;uses:="org.prop4j,featureide.fm.core.model",featureide.fm.core.editing.evaluation,featureide.fm.core.io;uses:="featureide.fm.core.model,org.eclipse.core.resources",featureide.fm.core.io.guidsl;uses:="org.prop4j,featureide.fm.core.model,org.eclipse.core.resources",featureide.fm.core.io.waterloo,featureide.fm.core.io.xml,guidsl,org.prop4j,org.sat4j;uses:="org.sat4j.core,org.sat4j.specs,org.sat4j.reader",org.sat4j.core;uses:="org.sat4j.specs",org.sat4j.minisat;uses:="org.sat4j.minisat.core,org.sat4j.core,org.sat4j.specs",org.sat4j.minisat.constraints;uses:="org.sat4j.minisat.core,org.sat4j.specs",org.sat4j.minisat.constraints.card;uses:="org.sat4j.minisat.core,org.sat4j.specs",org.sat4j.minisat.constraints.cnf;uses:="org.sat4j.minisat.core,org.sat4j.specs",org.sat4j.minisat.core;uses:="org.sat4j.specs",org.sat4j.minisat.learning;uses:="org.sat4j.minisat.core",org.sat4j.minisat.orders;uses:="org.sat4j.minisat.core",org.sat4j.minisat.restarts;uses:="org.sat4j.minisat.core",org.sat4j.minisat.uip;uses:="org.sat4j.minisat.core,org.sat4j.specs",org.sat4j.opt;uses:="org.sat4j.tools,org.sat4j.specs",org.sat4j.reader;uses:="org.sat4j.specs",org.sat4j.specs,org.sat4j.tools;uses:="org.sat4j.specs"

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Export-Package: featureide.refactoring Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.osgi,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.core.resources,org.eclipse.ui.ide,FeatureIDE_UI,org.eclipse.jface.text,org.eclipse.jdt.ui,org.eclipse.ui.editors,org.eclipse.core.filesystem,FeatureIDE_Core Bundle-Activator: featureide.refactoring.RefactoringPlugIn Bundle-Name: FeatureIDE - Jak Refactoring Plug-in Bundle-Version: 2.2.3.200904201621 Bundle-SymbolicName: FeatureIDE_Refactoring;singleton:=true Import-Package: mixin Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Bundle-ClassPath: .,lib/commons-logging-1.1.jar,lib/jakarta.jar,lib/log4j-1.2.15.jar,lib/refactor.jar Manifest-Version: 1.0

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Software program lines (SPL) have a long tradition and will gain momentum in the future. Today's research tries to move software development to a new quality of industrial production. Several solutions concerning different phases of the software development process have been proposed in order to cope with different problems of program family development. A major problem of program family engineering is still the missing tool support. The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

instructions.instruction: true

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

The vision is an IDE that brings all phases of the development process together consistently and in a user-friendly manner. Our first version focuses on AHEAD, a prominent design methodology and architectural model for feature-based program families. FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD tools like composition tools, compilers and more.

licenses.license: Free to use for research purposes.

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Bundle-Name: Ahead Plug-in Bundle-Version: 2.2.4.200905090213 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,FeatureIDE_Core,org.eclipse.core.resources;bundle-version="3.4.2" Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Bundle-SymbolicName: de.ovgu.featureide.ahead;singleton:=true Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Activator: de.ovgu.featureide.ahead.AheadPlugin

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: FeatureHouse composes several languages, e.g., Java, XML and Python.

instructions.instruction: true

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
